summary: The diff implements static logo loading in Hero and Header components, but uses `/assets/IMG_2219.jpeg` as the source path instead of the required `/assets/generated/logo.png`. Additionally, the actual image file is not added to `frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.png` as specified in REQ-3.

missing_requirements.requirement: Save the uploaded Kingston Customizations logo image as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.png and reference it from that path.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff uses `/assets/IMG_2219.jpeg` as the image source in both Hero.tsx and Header.tsx instead of the required `/assets/generated/logo.png`. Furthermore, no new file was added to `frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.png` â€” the ADDED FILES section shows none.
